content.task: Provide QA strategy and test criteria validation for systematic pytest.skip violation remediation. Current progress: 7+ violations fixed in tests/unit/test_stellar_exchange_contract.py and tests/adapted/test_stellar_components_adapted.py. Need QA approval for approach of replacing pytest.skip with proper test infrastructure (mocking, async API corrections, fixture improvements) vs bypassing tests. Must follow DEVELOPMENT_RULES.md "NEVER SKIP FAILING TESTS" principle.
content.context: COMPLIANCE_VIOLATIONS_REPORT.md shows Category 1 (Test bypassing) as major compliance issue. Previous sessions fixed Categories 2-5 achieving 100% flake8, security, and quality compliance. Current systematic approach: investigate root cause → fix API mismatches → create proper test doubles → validate functionality. Need QA validation this approach meets production quality standards.
